scenes.background: [Monica] frowns as [Alex] mentions your decision to finish your leave.
scenes.description: Bob raises an eyebrow. 'Did you think about how this decision affects the rest of the team?'

options.text: I did consider it, but balancing work and personal life is important. Let's ensure we have a contingency plan next time.
options.analysis: You show good emotional perception and self-regulation but could improve empathy and motivation by considering the team's immediate needs.

options.text: I apologize if it caused any inconvenience. I can offer some guidance remotely if needed.
options.analysis: You show empathy and offer support, which highlights your social skills, but the motivation to directly resolve the issue is lower.

options.text: I see your point. Let's discuss how we can better communicate and plan for such urgent tasks in the future.
options.analysis: You acknowledge the impact on the team and suggest improving communication, showing good social skills and empathy, but emotional perception could be better.
